resources.string: This is the debug screen. However this text will dissapear when data arrives from the server.

--- BUG FIXES
*Force close fixes
*IAC as data fixed
*Improved telnet negotiation with optional debug mode
*Disconnect crash fixes

--- NEW FEATURES
*Portrait Mode
*Word Wrap
*Optional Break Width
*Button Sets are now renamable

Visit the website for more details!
http://bt.happygoatstudios.com

--- TEST VERSION 2 --- 
*Fixed Landscape launcher crash
*Attempted fix for ANR on window open/close
*Added .kb clear and close options

--- TEST VERSION 1 --- 
*Aliases recursion works past 2x
*Buffer loss fixed
*Crashes on window exit/enter
*No primary button label crash fixed
*Custom fonts work again
*Side by Side Installation Prep
